name: Malt Ice Cream Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Malt Ice Cream Recipe: Evaporated milk 1 tin chilled Condense milk 1 tin Fresh cream whipped 1 Â½ cup Maltisers powder 2 sachet Maltiser chocolate crush 1 1/2 cup Vanilla essence 1 tsp
instructions: Beat chilled milk till double in volume. Mix in condense milk vanilla essence, powder, fold in fresh cream. Leave to set for 6 hours Open fold in coarsely crushed chocolate and freeze until set.
